item.title: Anthony Mackie Jokes He’s a ‘White Dude Legend’ Since His Co-Stars Often Get Award Nominations Over Him: ‘I Made Ryan Gosling Famous. Jeremy Renner…’
item.description: Anthony Mackie appeared on “The Tonight Show” to promote “Twisted Metal” Season 2, but the interview started with host Jimmy Fallon congratulating Mackie on his recent Emmy nom

item.title: Anthony Mackie Jokes He’s the “White Dude Legend” After Multiple Co-Stars Earned Emmy and Oscar Nominations
item.description: The Marvel actor also revealed why he’s happy to come in second place after being nominated for a guest actor Emmy this year.
